headline: AI Revolutionizes Non-Bank Mortgage Lending: Insights from HFS Research and Cognizant
summary: In a rapidly evolving housing economy, non-bank mortgage lenders are facing a wake-up call. A new joint study by HFS Research and Cognizant, "Reinventing the Non-Bank Mortgage Lending Journey in the Age of AI," reveals an industry grappling with operational fatigue, regulatory pressure, and fast-moving tech disruptions—while a small but bold segment rewrites the mortgage playbook.
